endpoints.description: Run a single prediction on the model

parameters.name: input_text

param_schema.title: Input Text
param_schema.description: Provide input for tasks with text: T2ST and T2TT.

parameters.description: Provide input for tasks with text: T2ST and T2TT.

parameters.name: input_audio

param_schema.title: Input Audio
param_schema.description: Provide input file for tasks with speech input: S2ST, S2TT and ASR.

parameters.description: Provide input file for tasks with speech input: S2ST, S2TT and ASR.

parameters.name: input_text_language

param_schema.description: Specify language of the input_text for T2ST and T2TT

parameters.description: Specify language of the input_text for T2ST and T2TT

parameters.name: target_language_text_only

param_schema.description: Set target language for tasks with text output only: S2TT, T2TT and ASR.

parameters.description: Set target language for tasks with text output only: S2TT, T2TT and ASR.

parameters.name: target_language_with_speech

param_schema.description: Set target language for tasks with speech output: S2ST or T2ST. Less languages are available for speech compared to text output.

parameters.description: Set target language for tasks with speech output: S2ST or T2ST. Less languages are available for speech compared to text output.
